content:
# I successfully gathered 5 units of coal and added it to my inventory. 
# This is a crucial step towards building my factory setup.

# Step 14: Now that I have coal, I can proceed to craft a Stone Furnace, which will allow me to smelt ores later on.
# I will attempt to craft the Stone Furnace now that I have the necessary fuel.

craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=1)  # Attempting to craft one Stone Furnace.
